content:
pnkfelix said:

hey Santiago Pastorino , it probably would be as good thing if we tweaked Nicholas Nethercote 's report to include issue numbers explicitly

bringing this here to discuss after the meeting, how exactly can we improve this
@pnkfelix just in case can you explain exactly how do you want the report to look like?

I was also thinking if I could talk with @Nicholas Nethercote about all this and tell them how helpful their report is and if we could maybe tweak it in a way that we can just directly grab it for the meeting without making edits
The main difference I can think of is that I’d like the PR numbers visible
The same way we do for other times we reference PRs, like for backports

pnkfelix said:

The main difference I can think of is that I’d like the PR numbers visible

so instead of Rollup of 13 pull requests you want Rollup of 13 pull requests #73756, right?
Sure, I can add the PR number
I'm glad the report is useful and being looked at :)
@njn would you be willing to do some small tweaks to your report so it can be just fetched and pasted directly and in an automatic way by our cli and used in the weekly?
if so, I can tell you a couple of things, one of the biggest ones is maybe placing each report in a different file
